Name: Boxing Saga
About the game: WBO boxing punch force before naming authority The first domestic sports Title boxing game VR IP As a boxer, kept in the ring to beat the opponent, won the champion gold belt, and the endless battle in order to protect it. To the punch, clever Dodge, constantly moving, a wave of the outbreak knock down opponents, or tough to deal with this is the end, you can choose the way of boxing. In your boxing career, you will encounter a variety of opponents, with record promotion, brokers will arrange more and more high level match match with you, and when you win at the top opponent, you will become a champion, and raised the golden belt.
